description._content: Velonis, Anthony,, 1911-, artist. Photography exhibition NYC : Federal Art Project, [1941] 1 print on board (poster) : silkscreen, color. Notes: Work Projects Administration Poster Collection (Library of Congress). Poster for Federal Art Project exhibition of photographs at the Hotel Nassau, Long Beach, L.I., showing camera and photograph of buildings. Subjects: Art exhibitions--New York (State)--Long Beach--1940-1950. Cameras--1940-1950. Photographic prints--1940-1950. Skyscrapers--1940-1950. Format: Exhibition posters--1940-1950. Screen prints--Color--1940-1950. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
